title: Meghan Markle Fuels Pregnancy Rumors After Re-Wearing ANOTHER Maternity Dress
text:
Is Meghan Markle pregnant with baby #2? Fans think so, and her recent wardrobe isn't doing anything to calm the speculation.

The Duchess of Sussex was spotted for the second day in a row wearing a dress from her maternity closet which she hadn't gotten into since last year during her pregnancy with baby Archie.

Related:

'RHOC' Star Meghan King Edmonds Shares a Huge Milestone With Son

Meghan Markle Reports For Royal Duty 1-Month After Giving Birth

Donald Trump Surprised Over 'Nasty' Comments by Meghan Markle

Prince Harry & Meghan Markle Inspire Boost of Humanitarian Aid in Honor of Baby

The Royal Wedding Was Amazing, Witness the Monumental Event ??

The Outfit!

The 38-year-old was seen in her olive and brown stripped dress on Tuesday with Prince Harry during their South Africa trip.

This is the same dress Meghan made her baby bump debut in after announcing her pregnancy in October 2018.

Fans Are Convinced!

On Monday, pregnancy speculation began to swirl on social media after fans noticed she was sporting a blue dress which she also famously wore during her pregnancy.

“I think Meghan Markle is already pregnant again. Okay… stand down," one fan wrote.

Another tweeted, “I’m gonna call it now... Meghan Markle is pregnant again and due around May next year again.”

Even parents are getting in on the bet. "My mom is adamant that Meghan Markle is pregnant again," wrote a Twitter user.

Baby Archie!
description: Meghan Markle is continuing to fuel the pregnancy rumors by re-wearing a maternity dress for the second time in a row.
